title: Jack Ryan Movie Cast Adds Max Beesley, Douglas Hodge & More to John Krasinski-Led Action Thriller
description: The upcoming Jack Ryan movie cast has added four more to the action thriller, with Deadline reporting that Max Beesley, Douglas Hodge, JJ Feild, and Betty Gabriel, and more have joined the upcoming project. Who is in the Jack Ryan movie? According to Deadline’s report, Beesley, Hodge, Feild, and Gabriel have joined alongside the previously […] The post Jack Ryan Movie Cast Adds Max Beesley, Douglas Hodge & More to John Krasinski-Led Action Thriller appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Anthony Nash
excerpt: The upcoming Jack Ryan movie cast has added four more to the action thriller, according to a new report from Deadline.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The upcoming Jack Ryan movie cast has added four more to the action thriller, with Deadline reporting that Max Beesley, Douglas Hodge, JJ Feild, and Betty Gabriel, and more have joined the upcoming project. Who is in the Jack Ryan movie? According to Deadline’s report, Beesley, Hodge, Feild, and Gabriel have joined alongside the previously announced Sienna Miller, Wendell Pierce, and Michael Kelly, the latter two of whom will be reprising their roles as James Greer and Mike November from the Amazon series, respectively. Gabriel also having appeared in seasons three and four of Tom Clancy’s Jack Ryan. Beesley has been acting for more than three decades, and has appeared in a litany of projects, the most recent of which was Guy Ritchie’s The Gentlemen. Douglas Hodge most recently appeared in 2024’s We Live in Time, and will also star in the upcoming action thriller G20, which is set to release on April 10, 2025. Feild is best known for his role in the television series Turn: Washington’s Spies, and also recently appeared in 2019’s Ford v. Ferrari. Gabriel is likely best known for her appearance in Jordan Peele’s Get Out, but has also recently starred in the 2023 horror film It Lives Inside, and will next appear in the action thriller Novocaine, starring Jack Quaid, which releases on March 14, 2025. The Jack Ryan movie will be led by John Krasinski, who is reprising his role as the titular character from the Prime Video series he stars in. The movie is being directed by Andrew Bernstein, who was an executive producer and director on Jack Ryan Season 2. The script was written by Aaron Rabin. Plot details are being kept under wraps at this time. The movie is being produced through Paramount Pictures and Skydance. David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, John Kelly, and Carlton Cuse will serve as executive producers. It’s not immediately clear if the Jack Ryan movie will receive a theatrical release or if it is being made for Prime Video. A release date for the Jack Ryan movie has not yet been set. All four seasons of the Jack Ryan television series, meanwhile, are available to stream on Amazon Prime Video. (Source: Deadline)
html:
The upcoming Jack Ryan movie cast has added four more to the action thriller, with Deadline reporting that Max Beesley, Douglas Hodge, JJ Feild, and Betty Gabriel, and more have joined the upcoming project.

Who is in the Jack Ryan movie?

According to Deadline’s report, Beesley, Hodge, Feild, and Gabriel have joined alongside the previously announced Sienna Miller, Wendell Pierce, and Michael Kelly, the latter two of whom will be reprising their roles as James Greer and Mike November from the Amazon series, respectively.

Gabriel also having appeared in seasons three and four of Tom Clancy’s Jack Ryan.

Beesley has been acting for more than three decades, and has appeared in a litany of projects, the most recent of which was Guy Ritchie’s The Gentlemen. Douglas Hodge most recently appeared in 2024’s We Live in Time, and will also star in the upcoming action thriller G20, which is set to release on April 10, 2025.

Feild is best known for his role in the television series Turn: Washington’s Spies, and also recently appeared in 2019’s Ford v. Ferrari. Gabriel is likely best known for her appearance in Jordan Peele’s Get Out, but has also recently starred in the 2023 horror film It Lives Inside, and will next appear in the action thriller Novocaine, starring Jack Quaid, which releases on March 14, 2025.

The Jack Ryan movie will be led by John Krasinski, who is reprising his role as the titular character from the Prime Video series he stars in. The movie is being directed by Andrew Bernstein, who was an executive producer and director on Jack Ryan Season 2. The script was written by Aaron Rabin.

Plot details are being kept under wraps at this time. The movie is being produced through Paramount Pictures and Skydance. David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, John Kelly, and Carlton Cuse will serve as executive producers.

It’s not immediately clear if the Jack Ryan movie will receive a theatrical release or if it is being made for Prime Video. A release date for the Jack Ryan movie has not yet been set.

All four seasons of the Jack Ryan television series, meanwhile, are available to stream on Amazon Prime Video.

(Source: Deadline)
